name: Flora The Chef
details: This is a personal service review-based project where a The Chef Called Flora works with homemade food, party dishes etc.

name: Weekly Walking Routine App
details: It's an app by which you can maintain your daily walking routine. You can count your walking time and break time.

name: ULearning
details: It's e-learning website where courses has included category wise. Course Details also added. You can download the course details as pdf file.

name: Used Cloth Collection
details: A dynamic website of Used Cloth Collection where admin can control buyer and seller, seller can add their products for sell, buyer can buy their products.

name: Daily News
details: It's a newspaper website. Different kind of news included. You can find here news according to category, details news is also available.

name: Select Best Five
details: It's a sports related website. You can select best five players from the all players. Budget calculation included. Responsive for all device
